title: Interpretation of a dream about adultery for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about adultery for a married woman may indicate the presence of a thief or perhaps betrayal in the broad sense. The dream may carry a sign of betrayal of a covenant or trust or perhaps marital betrayal, but nevertheless, the interpretation of this dream all the time does not indicate betrayal but the details of the dream have an influence on the interpretation and position. The dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about adultery for a married woman. Adultery in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she is a woman who protects herself from getting involved in the wrong way and protects her home and her husband, and God knows best. If a married woman sees adultery in her dream, this may indicate that she is an independent-minded person and thinks before a long time. From making any decision with patience, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a married woman committing adultery in a dream means that someone is exploiting her and forcing her to do something that she does not want, and God knows best. Adultery in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the existence of a certain decision that she must make without taking the opinion of any outside party. In the matter, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a married woman in a dream trying to seduce someone may indicate the possibility of falling into some problems soon or an indication that she is facing a problem at the present time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about adultery for a married woman by Ibn SirinProstitution in a married woman’s dream , according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, is evidence of the dreamer’s lack of certain feelings and her desire to feel distress in her personal life. This dream is a reflection of repressed desires thought in the subconscious, and God knows best. This dream may mean a dispute between a married woman and her husband, increasing problems between them and a lack of understanding between them, and the same thing if a married woman sees that she is seducing a young man in a dream. The prostitution of a married woman in a dream, its interpretation, is closely related to her life with her husband and the degree of satisfaction she feels in her life with him. The dream may mean that the dreamer feels the cruelty of her husband, and that she is trying all the time to preserve her dignity and not looking for a forbidden way to compensate for what she lacks. And God knows best. Seeing a married woman for the sake of prostitution in a dream is a symbol of betrayal. Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is reading the Qur’anic verse “The adulterer and the adulterer” is actually adultery. What is the interpretation of rejecting adultery for a married woman Al-Nabulsi? Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a married woman in a dream while she She refuses to commit adultery with a strange man, which is evidence that she is one of the good women known for her good reputation and an indication of her loyalty to her husband, and God knows. Better. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband refuses to commit adultery, this indicates that the husband is a generous person and is trying to take care of her and make her happy, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The wife’s refusal to have an affair with her husband in a dream is evidence that problems will soon arise between them, and these problems will make her feel sad, God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Denying adultery in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her feeling of contentment, inner peace, great conviction, and abstaining from sin, and God knows best. If a married woman commits adultery in a dream with a dead person and does not deny it, this may be a sign that she has suffered a great loss or is losing someone. he loves her,

title: The 8 most important interpretations of seeing dancing in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing yourself dancing in a dream? It indicates the tribulations and problems that the dreamer is going through. The interpretation of seeing a girl dancing in a dream? It announces a scandal. What is the interpretation of a married woman who sees herself dancing in front of her husband? It indicates great happiness in their personal life. What does it mean to see a pregnant woman dancing to calm music? It indicates a healthy pregnancy. What is the interpretation of seeing dancing on a mountain? An indicator of fear and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about dancing by Ibn SirinDancing in a dream can indicate adversity and problems that the dreamer is going through. Hence, seeing a sick person Dancing in a dream is evidence of the increasing seriousness of the disease. So, seeing a prisoner dancing in a dream is evidence that he will soon be released from prison. Seeing a young boy dancing in a dream may indicate illness. Dreaming of dancing in front of the sea means a lot of problems. It may indicate Dancing in front of someone in a dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer misfortunes. Singles’ dream of dancing: Seeing a girl dancing in a dream means the scandal that she will be exposed to. If an unmarried woman sees herself dancing at a wedding, this indicates that she will feel physical pain. After that, dancing may indicate In a girl’s dream, it refers to the prohibited money she gets from one of the jobs she does. Seeing a girl in a dream dancing to popular songs, this is an indication of the problems, sadness, and anxiety that she will face. Interpretation of a dream about dancing for a married woman: Seeing a married woman dancing in front of her husband in a dream indicates great happiness. In their personal lives. If a married woman sees herself dancing in the street, this is a sign that she will get into a lot of trouble and she must be careful. Dancing in the street in a dream is evidence of a scandal that she and her husband will be exposed to. If a married woman sees that she is dancing between a woman and a man, then this Evidence of great misfortunes to which a married woman is exposed. Dream of a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream dancing to calm music, this indicates her healthy pregnancy. Dancing in a dream indicates an easy birth. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is dancing to loud tunes, this indicates that she is going through With a difficult birth. After that, seeing a pregnant woman dancing in front of people indicates a scandal that she will be exposed to. Seeing a pregnant woman imprisoned dancing is evidence of unhappiness. Interpretation of a dream about dancing for a man: Seeing a man in a dream dancing with loud voices, this indicates the problems and difficulties that he is going through. So, Watching dancing on a mountain is a sign of fear and feeling uncomfortable. If a man dances in a dream like a woman, this indicates that he is a man of weak character. After that, if a man dances at a party among many people, this is a sign of losing money.

title: The correct interpretation of seeing planets in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a planet in a dreamPlanet in a dreamAmong the visions that interpreters differed in their interpretation and access to their signs and connotations, each of them interpreted them according to the shape, size, or color of the planet, and it is scientifically known that the planets of the solar system are distinguished from each of them in addition to several characteristics, so we will present to you everything that emerged in the interpretation This vision.Interpretation of a dream about a planet in a dreamIf the planet comes in only one person’s dream, it has one interpretation, and if it comes with one of the other planets, it has another interpretation, and the red and black planets in one dream have a different interpretation from the other, so we will show you the different interpretations according to Details of the vision. Interpretation of a dream about planets by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin resorted to interpreting the dream. Planets in a dream. Given the position of the planets and their height in the sky, we find that he interprets this vision as a position for an important person or position that he will take if the planet shines light in the dream, but if the planet is dark. This has a completely different interpretation. It may indicate that disasters will occur in the dreamer’s life in the coming period. When someone sees a planet in his home in a dream, this is a sign of the happy life he lives with his family and may indicate that his home will be a place where noble and superior leaders meet. But if he sees the planet in the morning This may indicate that he is subject to gossip and that there are those who share his biography with each other. The seven planets in the dreamer’s dream indicate that he will get a lot of money from a profitable trade, but if he sees the planet falling, this indicates, according to Ibn Sirin, the disappearance Money and a person falling into extreme poverty. Seeing a planet in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq read in the interpretation of the vision. Planets in a dream. Its meaning varies greatly from one vision to another, as there are many ways to the planet, as we will explain now, and each situation has its own interpretation. Seeing planets scattered in space in a dream The dreamer indicates the death of people with high positions in society. As for the stars, when the sleeper sees them shining during the day, this indicates that he will be exposed to scandal or slander among people. When the planets gather in the dreamer’s house, this is clear evidence of his high status, to the point that the nobles and nobles will They gather in his house. When the planets or stars fall in the dreamer, Imam Al-Sadiq sees that evil will happen, and this evil may represent a mass death that will occur in that person’s country, and this death may be the result of a virus or infection spreading among people. If he sees in his dream that he is eating a planet in his hand, then this is evidence of the good that he will receive in reality, and this good can be a prestigious job and a high social status. In Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of the house directly above the planet in a person’s dream, he found that this is an indication that This house will happen - God willing - and he indicated that this disaster may be a divorce that happens to a married person. As for the disappearance of the planets in the dreamer’s dream, it is a sign of the collapse of his kingdom if he is a man from countries and those in power, but if he is an ordinary man who has a job, he may lose

title: Interpretation of a dream about kissing the Holy Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing kissing the Holy Qur’an in a dream, and the Holy Qur’an is the book of God Almighty that He revealed to His Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, as a warning and good news, a verse from God, and the Qur’an is the constitution of life, and it contains news of the predecessors and news about them, the prophets, the resurrection, the Day of Resurrection, heaven and hell, and the life of humans, and reading a message from this is multiplied by ten good deeds, and God multiplies good deeds for whomever He wills. Kissing the Qur’an in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate many good things for the seer, the state of his good condition, the response to his prayers, and the fulfillment of his hopes. It can also indicate knowledge, wisdom, and the acquisition of inheritance. In this article, we review the vision of kissing the Holy Quran in a dream for men and women in detail on the summit website. Interpretation of seeing the Quran in a dream for a single woman Seeing the Quran in a dream is one of the good visions that indicates righteousness, piety, and achieving what she wanted in her previous life. Seeing the Holy Quran indicates the good qualities that the dreamer possesses, such as modesty, honesty, and good treatment of people. Seeing the Quran also indicates her marriage to a man who has good qualities and enjoys high morals and a prestigious position. Interpretation of seeing many copies of the Quran in a dream Seeing many copies of the Quran in a dream indicates the abundance of good deeds in the dreamer's life. Seeing many copies of the Quran in a man's dream indicates achieving what he wants in his life and his righteousness and piety. Seeing many books of the Quran in a dream for a married woman indicates righteous offspring, their righteousness and piety, as well as achieving what she desires in her life. Seeing a library full of copies of the Quran in the dream of an unmarried young man indicates his avoidance of disobedience and sins and his righteousness in the commandments of God. It also indicates his marriage to a beautiful girl with good morals and religion. Seeing purity before carrying the Qur’an indicates the dreamer’s trust in God. Seeing the Qur’an in different shapes and sizes indicates piety, faith, and many good deeds. Interpretation of a dream about placing a hand on the Qur’an for a married woman Seeing the Qur’an in a married woman’s dream indicates the end of her worries and the alleviation of the problems that were worrying her. Kissing the Qur’an indicates answering the prayer and fulfilling what she wanted in her life. Seeing her husband swearing on the Qur’an may indicate cheating and deception. It also suggests that you see a son swearing on the Qur’an to disobey him and disobey him. Interpretation of a dream about swearing on the Qur’an for a man Seeing an oath in the Qur’an can indicate lying and deception. Seeing him kissing the Qur’an indicates that the prayer has been answered and that what he wants will come true. The Qur’an indicates knowledge and wisdom and may indicate acquiring an inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about placing a hand on the Qur’an for a pregnant woman Seeing the Qur’an in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a lot of good for her and an abundance of livelihood. The Qur’an also indicates goodness and blessings in her life. Kissing the Qur’an in a dream indicates achieving what is desired and an easy birth. The Qur’an in a dream Pregnant women show a mood of fatigue and pain. Interpretation of a dream about placing a hand on the Qur’an for a divorced woman. title: Interpretation of the dream of eating meat by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating meatMeat is an animal tissue and is considered one of the main foods for humans because it contains a lot of proteins, iron, and vitamins that are beneficial to the body. Together, the most important thing in this vision has been said, so follow us...! Interpretation of a dream about eating meatCommentators say that seeing a hungry and cooked dreamer in a dream , leading to very good and abundant food that he enjoys. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she is eating lamb meat, this indicates that one of her family members will suffer from excessive fatigue. Also, seeing the dreamer eating cooked goat meat in a dream indicates the stubborn character for which he is known. If a person sees in a dream that he is eating cooked beef, then this represents his hard work and diligence in this world to reach his goal. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating raw beef, then this symbolizes the hardness of his heart and his lack of compassion for others. As for the pregnant woman who sees meat in In a dream, eating it is food for the male. Seeing the dreamer in a dream eating the meat of a bull means victory over enemies and freedom from trouble. The dreamer, if he dreams of eating beef, symbolizes the presence of a traveler approaching him, but he will return again. Interpretation of the dream of eating meat by Ibn Sirin, says the scholar Ibn Sirin: Seeing meat in a dream and eating it cooked is better than raw. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream eating raw meat means suffering great losses and losing his property. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating meat without cooking it, this symbolizes the deepening of people’s symptoms and ongoing evil. If The dreamer saw in a dream that he was eating beef and nothing else, then this symbolizes the problems of that period. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating beef, this means that the time of birth is approaching, and she will give birth to a boy. As for the dreamer who dreams of eating beef, Camels, this symbolizes the great benefits that you will gain. If one dreams of eating camel meat, it symbolizes exposure to calamities or a serious illness. Interpretation of a dream about eating meat for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is eating cooked meat, this will lead to many good things Which you will come to and the adequate diet that you will enjoy. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating grilled meat, this symbolizes happiness and the imminent date of receiving a lot of good news soon. If the fortuneteller sees meat in his dream and someone eats it in front of her, this means that he will enter into Introducing her and saying bad things about her. Also, seeing the dreamer eating cooked meat in a dream indicates that the date of her engagement to someone suitable for her is imminent. If you see camel meat in a dream and eat it, this symbolizes exposure to excessive fatigue or injustice. Also, seeing a dreamer in a dream eating meat Donkeys mean a lot of money that you will earn soon. If the dreamer is sick and sees in a dream that he is eating meat cooked with vegetables, this indicates a speedy recovery soon. Interpretation of a dream about eating meat for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that she is eating meat, this gives her good news

title: Interpretation of seeing divorce and marriage in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing divorce and marriage in a dream: God Almighty made marriage a year of life, so that the process of reproduction and preservation of human offspring can take place, and there are many people who may get married, but it may lead to divorce at the end of the marriage, and this can be considered. A- One of the matters that cannot be carried out by one of the spouses is that he may live with the other, and that the most hated law in the eyes of God Almighty is divorce, while many people see divorce and marriage in dreams, and they may search for explanations. And the evidence for this. Interpretation of seeing divorce and marriage in a dream. There are many of us who may see divorce or marriage in a dream, while it can bring to a person many signs and interpretations in his life, and these dreams: seeing divorce and marriage in the last dream, such as: - Seeing divorce and marriage in a dream shows many Of interpretations, including problems that will arise between spouses. Also, if a married woman sees that she will marry another man, this may indicate that her husband is exploiting her. It is a sign of self-reflection for a woman in her life. Ibn Sirin explained that if a man divorces his wife, this may indicate This is based on the multiple relationships between them. It can be considered one of the signs of many problems that will be present in the life of the fortuneteller. It can also be interpreted as an interpretation that his wife will divorce him or that the wife will leave her husband. While it is one of the signs that the husband may suffer from poverty and many losses. See also: Interpretation of seeing congratulations in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of the dream of my sister separating and marrying another. We may see many different dreams, which we may feel are worrying things that will happen in our lives, but one of these things is the interpretation of the dream of my sister separating and marrying another. It has many interpretations, such as: It could be: It is one of the signs of many problems that will arise between family members. While seeing an unmarried woman whose brother divorced his wife, this shows the trouble that her brother will fall into. Also, the divorce of the husband, from a person with limited income to the husband, and the situation is wealthy. It is also one of the signs of the many problems that will arise between family members. Signs that indicate that the dreamer can always strive for perfection and satisfy his desires. Whereas when the dreamer is not married and sees this dream, it may indicate that he is worried about many future matters. I am watching my single sister’s divorce. An unmarried girl is considered one of the characters who can She has many different indicators in her dreams, and among the interpretations of I see the divorce of my single sister, which include the following: It can be considered one of the signs that her marriage will be soon. Also, seeing a happy divorced sister in a dream may mean that she will not be satisfied with marriage from the beginning of her dream. Whereas That when there is a dispute between the mother and her sister, this may indicate the collapse of problems between them. See also: Interpretation of dreams that I was in contact with a woman I do not know in a dreamInterpretation of parental divorce in a dreamOne of the most difficult feelings that children can experience is seeing their parents separated from each other Having to explain the divorce of their parents

title: Interpretation of dead speech in a dream Seeing dead speech in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the dead alive Talking with a single girl to a married woman to a pregnant woman to a divorced woman Whether the dead person asks someone to laugh, talk on the phone, eat, come back to life and more Likewise, you read some secrets related to the dreamer and those around him and the oddities and wonders of seeing The dead in a dream and their words that are often true because they are in the abode of truth. Just say it is true, but it is not enough to stop at this point. Not everything that the dead says in a dream is true. There are other rules and conditions that must be met. The word of the dead in a dream must not conflict with Reason and law, and it is not necessary for his words to come true, because dreams cannot be relied upon for anything, they are only for taming. Seeing a dead person biting you in a dream or giving you advice about religion or this world. Sometimes the words of the deceased are a warning against some actions that he takes The dreamer, whether in the treatment of his relatives or his relationship with his environment. The devil can take the form of a dead person and utter frightening and disturbing words that make the dreamer experience horrific periods, such as telling the dreamer the date of his death or telling him that you are one of the companions of hell or heaven or the like. . Explicitly like accusing someone of committing an act or crime, and this leads to hostilities...etc. I must be careful when dealing with such dreams and not pay too much attention to them. If the dream refers to a dead person you know and he tells you in your dream that he is not dead, then this indicates the justice of the deceased’s cause, God willing, in the same matter that explains seeing the dead person sitting on it. bed. Or a crown or ornament on his head. But if the dead person comes in the dream with his voice only, and you cannot see him in the dream, and you call the dreamer or speak to him, and the dreamer responds with his words, or the dead person asks him to go out with him, and he comes out and is not far from him, then these cases make it clear that the dreamer will end. By the end of that dead person, whether in illness, accident, drowning, demolition, or anything else. As for seeing the dead person in a dream, whether you know him by kinship, or know him without kinship, or simply know that he is dead, he comes to tell the fortuneteller that he will die. At this hour, God knows best. It is better that it be closer in reality, closer to the end of the dreamer’s life. The interpretation of who follows the dead in a dream and the interpretation of who follows the dead has two aspects: The first is that the deceased in a dream asks the person to follow him or he finds himself following the deceased and entering an abandoned house with him or entering his house. . The house of a dead person then does not leave whoever entered it, the dreamer will die. The other aspect is the dreamer leaving the house he entered with the dead, as this indicates that the dreamer will be on the verge of death, either from illness, drowning, or an accident, but he will remain alive and continue his life. . Interpretation of a dead person’s words in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing red grapes in a dream

preview.html: If he eats green grapes, this indicates that he will obtain a legitimate livelihood in his life, and that distributing red grapes is explained by the goodness that he does. Interpretation of seeing red grapes in a dream for a single girl. Also, seeing red grapes for a single woman indicates that she will earn a lot of money in her life, God willing. Whereas if he eats red grapes, this indicates that he is entering a new matter and needs to be a little patient. Watching a single woman picking red grapes shows that she is looking for a good man for her. It is an indication that seeing red grapes in a dream is a clear sign of goodness. And food for the dreamer. Red grapes with a delicious taste in a dream indicate marriage to someone she wants, who is single. Also, if she is looking for red grapes in a dream, this explains her falling into hardship and great debts in her life. Single people who distribute red grapes indicate That they will become very wealthy in the near future. He also pointed out that rotten red grapes are a sign that the dreamer is doing something wrong. It indicates that big red grapes in a dream, indicates that their situation will soon change to luxury and wealth. See also: Interpretation of seeing black grapes In a dream: Interpretation of seeing red grapes in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman eating red grapes means that she is out of a sad mood that she is currently experiencing. It also indicates that eating red grapes in a dream is goodness that will come to her through her husband, God willing. Whereas if the married woman is looking About red grapes in a dream, this indicates a happy life for her. The juice of red grapes explains to her that she is in trouble with a cruel and unjust person in her life. To see a lot of red grapes, this means good things are coming that need a little patience. A married woman squeezing grapes Red shows her injustice towards herself and her married life. Red grapes also show a married woman that she can get rid of her debts. If he buys red grapes, this is a sign of a new job that he will do soon. A married woman who longs for red grapes but does not find them announces the distress she is experiencing in her life. Interpretation of seeing red grapes in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman drinking red grape juice explains that she is living with a person who has wronged her all her life. And if he eats red grapes in a dream, this means that he will get rid of severe sadness that he is currently experiencing. As for a divorced woman who sees red grapes, this indicates Get relief from her worries and problems. Seeing grapes for a divorced woman is a great good for her and a happiness that she will live with, God willing. If the dreamer takes red grapes from her ex-husband, this indicates her return to him. For the dreamer, red grapes that are out of season indicate lies and deception that he is currently experiencing. Chewing red grapes also indicates that he is going through a major crisis at this time. As for a divorced woman, she is looking for a red grape and does not find it, a sign of passing sadness. Seeing rotten red grapes in a dream indicates troubles and troubles in her life, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about green grapes

title: Interpretation of seeing mango in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing mango in a dream or dream Mango is one of the fruits that taste and smell good, and seeing it in a dream indicates kindness, food, pleasant surprises, and the satisfaction of the dreamer’s desires, and we will explain this in this article through the Vision website. Interpretation of seeing mango inside a dream in detail based on the opinion of senior commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, ancient or contemporary, for unmarried and married young men, unmarried and married girls, and pregnant women. Woman, so follow us on the Vision website. What is the interpretation of Imam Ibn Sirin to see mango in a dream? Look at the green mango, showing the piety of the seer, his wisdom and sincerity in expression. Seeing yourself eating mango in a dream, it indicates the end of anxiety and anxiety. See the yellow mango, it indicates hearing good news and wishing you good luck. Seeing a mango tree in a dream, it indicates a good biography and good luck for the fortuneteller. Seeing mango for the traveler is a braid with ease of affairs and his safe return to his family. Seeing rotten mango indicates illness or anxiety and sadness. What is the interpretation of a dream about ripe mango? Seeing mango in large quantities, it indicates the collapse of interest in peace after strife and the collapse of disputes and problems. Look at the green mango, elements of good health and recovery from illness. See peeling fresh mango indicates financial stability and family stability. Seeing mango in a dream for a married woman indicates happiness and stability in her married life. What is the interpretation of a dream about picking mango from a tree? Seeing mango pieces in a married man's dream indicates the number of children according to the number of mangoes he saw in Dream. Seeing mango in a man's dream indicates profit in trade, profits from work and high financial performance. Seeing picking mangoes in a divorced dream indicates successive successes in her life, the end of worry and sadness and a better life. What is the interpretation of seeing eating mangoes in a dream for a single woman? Seeing mangoes in a single woman's dream indicates the fulfillment of desires. If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating fresh mangoes, this indicates the fulfillment of her desires in life and gaining a prestigious scientific position or a prestigious position. Seeing drinking mango juice in an unmarried woman's dream indicates hearing happy news and happy occasions. Seeing rotten mangoes indicates anxiety, worry, failure in studies or cancellation of engagements. What is the interpretation of a dream about picking mangoes from a tree for a single woman? Seeing picking mangoes at the right time for singles indicates the death of anxiety and sadness and a new, better life for the girl. Seeing mangoes at the wrong time indicates the fulfillment of impossible desires and the achievement of desired and planned goals and aspirations. What is the interpretation of buying mangoes in Dream? Seeing mango in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth and the easy birth of a happy child. I see myself buying mango in a dream. It indicates happiness, pleasure, and pleasant surprises. Seeing mango in a dream indicates the end of anxiety and worry. Seeing mango slices. This indicates in a man’s dream comfort after distress and hardship and paying off the
